text: The 1923-24 Brooklyn Wanderers F.C. season was the second season for the club in the American Soccer League. The club finished the season in 5th place but won the Southern New York Football Association Cup. ==American Soccer League== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Date !Opponents !H/A !Result F–A !Scorers !Attendance |- bgcolor="#ffffdd" |7 October 1923 |Bethlehem Steel F.C. |H |1-1 |Doherty |2,000 |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" |14 October 1923 |Newark F.C. |H |2-1 |Hogg, Doherty | |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" |28 October 1923 |Philadelphia F.C. |H |1-0 |Hogg | |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" |3 November 1923 |J. & P.
